channel.title: Torvascape by Deven [PI] CHECK DESCRIPTION
channel.description:
We need
[b]Coder (1)[/b] To help me with some minigames and customs for a more enjoyable experience [b]Donater for VPS(1)[/b] [b]Any Other Useful Helpers[/b]
My server features all customs many minigames small community 50% staff filled new home edited home added shops new items and more! Want to see some videos?
Many features are not featured in video we currently have an rs-ps I CANT POSTient-v1-t3.html Do not use webclient use new clieTorvaScape_Client_V.1.rar Forums http://torvascapee.freeforums.org/ New client http://torvascapee.freeforums.org/v2-must-use-this-t24.html Heres How to Apply
Age: Experience: Position applying for: Abilites: Will donate (yes) (no): Has own server(must terminate if accepted): Has [b]HAD[/b]own Server: Suggestions: What is different about you:
